content: Hey Friends, I thought I'd start this wiki page: https://github.com/HL7/fhircast-docs/wiki/Public-FHIRcast-implementations to provide a directory of the publicly accessible testing tools and documentation that different organizations are created and which are useful to new implementers. I haven't actually added anything to it, yet, though. Some potentially good resources are the links that Alex and Catie provided.
If you have publicly accessible FHIRcast documentation or testing tools, and would like to advertise it, will you please add links on this wiki page?
